sentences.sContent: For example geography, meteorology, physics and history.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example geography, meteorology, physics and history.
sentences.sCn: 例如地理学，气象学，物理（学）和历史。

sentences.sContent: Modern weather forecasts try to take the mystery out of the meteorology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Modern weather forecasts try to take the mystery out of the meteorology.
sentences.sCn: 现代天气预报试图揭开气象学的神秘面纱。

sentences.sContent: The typhoon is a category of tropical cyclones. In meteorology, press the world meteorological organization definition: tropical cyclone center sustained winds up to 12 level.
sentences.sContent_eng: The typhoon is a category of tropical cyclones. In meteorology, press the world meteorological organization definition: tropical cyclone center sustained winds up to 12 level.
sentences.sCn: 台风是热带气旋的一个类别。在气象学上，按世界气象组织定义：热带气旋中心持续风速达到12级。

remMethod.val: meteor(陨石； 天气) + ology(…学) → 古代根据陨石判断天气 → 气象学

words.tran: 流星；[气象] 大气现象

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of weather conditions
